title: Misnomers
content:
[Sailor _Gothic?_](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906113617/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/cubanica/sailor-gothic/)

Am I crazy, or are some people starting to throw around empty jargon just to make the name of a typeface “sound like the name of a typeface”?

 [‹ Native Fontographer for Mac OS X now available](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906113617/http:/typophile.com/node/16477 "Go to previous forum topic") [The e-shopping interface of the future? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906113617/http:/typophile.com/node/16731 "Go to next forum topic")
author: cerulean
